definitions.definition: A son of Ali and brother of Hassan ; a martyr , and Shi'a Imam .
A male given name from Arabic used by Muslims , diminutive of حسن ( “ Hasan ” ) meaning good or handsome .
A Muslim surname from Arabic derived from the Arabic given name.

main_definition: ( Islam ) A son of Ali and brother of Hassan ; a martyr , and Shi'a Imam .
secondary_definitions: A male given name from Arabic used by Muslims , diminutive of حسن ( “ Hasan ” ) meaning good or handsome .
A Muslim surname from Arabic derived from the Arabic given name.
